T02D1817:217b-0: ro myang dag @217b gi sdig pa sbyong /
T02D1817:217b-2: ces pa gsang ba'i dbang zhes bya ba'ang dang por
T02D1817:217b-3: byang chub kyi sems dkar dmar yin pa nyid dang
T02D1817:217b-4: / de'ang ting nge 'dzin yin pa nyid dang /
T02D1817:217b-5: slob ma'i lces ro myang ba nyid dang /
T02D1817:217b-6: ngag gi sdig pa sbyong ba zhes bya ba 'di
T02D1817:217b-7: dag dang ldan pa la gsang ba'i dbang zhes bshad
T02D1817:217b-8: do // 'dis ci zhig byed ce na /
T02D1817:217b-9: gang zhig gzhan la thal 'gyur ba //
T02D1817:217b-10: 'di yis sel bar byed pa yin //
T02D1817:217b-11: zhes pa 'di ni gang zhig gis //
T02D1817:217b-12: gang zhig thal bar byed pa'o //
T02D1817:217b-13: 'o na gcig gis 'gyur mod ce na /
T02D1817:217b-14: ngag gi sdig pa sbyong ba ni bzlas pas kyang 'gyur bas byang chub sems yin no //
T02D1817:217b-15: gzhan yang byang chub sems zhes bya ba las gzhan ma smos na /
T02D1817:217b-16: tha mal ba'i byang chub sems kyis kyang 'gyur bas de bsal ba'i phyir ting nge 'dzin no //
T02D1817:217b-17: gzhan la'ang ci rigs su sbyar ro //
T02D1817:217b-18: gsang ba zhes bya ba 'di'i slob dpon yang gang zhig yin zhe na /
T02D1817:217b-19: gang zhig dbab dang bzlog shes dang //
T02D1817:217b-20: rig ma yon tan ldan pa dbul //
T02D1817:217b-21: zhes pa slob dpon zhes sbyar ro //
T02D1817:217b-22: gang zhig byang chub sems dbab pa dang bzlog pa shes pa dang /
T02D1817:217b-23: rig ma rtog pa'i sbyor ba la mkhas pa rig ma'ang yon tan dang ldan pa ste /
T02D1817:217b-24: 'di dag kyang 'bras bu bde ba ster ba'i phyir slob dpon zhe'o //
T02D1817:217b-25: slob dpon des kyang slob ma ji lta bu la bskur zhe na /
T02D1817:217b-26: bum pa'i dbang rdzogs rtog pa chung //
T02D1817:217b-27: gsang la dad pas gzhan la min //
T02D1817:217b-28: zhes pa dang por slob dpon las legs par sbyangs pa'i bum pa'i dbang thob pa dang /
T02D1817:217b-29: rdzas la sogs pa la rtog pa chung zhing dngos su 'jug nus pa dang /
T02D1817:217b-30: gsang ba'i don la mi skrag mi dangs shing shin tu dad pa dang /
T02D1817:217b-31: gzhan yang skad snyan pa dang /
T02D1817:217b-35: de la dbang bskur ba'i rgyu ci zhe na /
T02D1817:217b-36: gnyi ga'i sbyor ba las byung ba'i //
T02D1817:217b-38: zhes pa gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i rgyu'ang slob dpon
T02D1817:217b-39: dang phyag rgya ma'i shes rab dang ting nge 'dzin
T02D1817:217b-40: te 'dis dbang la phan par byed pa dang /
T02D1817:217b-41: med na mi 'byung ba'i phyir de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1817:218a-2: slob dpon gnyis yod gnang ba dang //
T02D1817:218a-3: rdzas rnams phun sum tshogs pa dus //
T02D1817:218a-4: zhes pa gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i dus ni dang por slob dpon khyad par can dang /
T02D1817:218a-5: rig ma yon tan dang ldan pa rnyed pa dang //
T02D1817:218a-6: de nyid kyis gnang ba byin pa dang ;
T02D1817:218a-7: khu ba dang rakta rgyas shing 'bab pa dang /
T02D1817:218a-8: rang gi yon tan dang rdzas dang gzugs la sogs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i dus so //
T02D1817:218a-9: 'o na gsang ba'i dbang gi gleng gzhi zhes bya ba'ang gang yin zhe na /
T02D1817:218a-10: gang tshe rtsa ba'i rgyud dag tu //
T02D1817:218a-11: bdud rtsi'i rol brgyal bslang ba'o //
T02D1817:218a-12: zhes pa rtsa ba'i rgyud gsang ba 'dus pa zhes
T02D1817:218a-13: bya ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D1817:218a-14: du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bdud rtsi lnga
T02D1817:218a-15: la dngos su spyad pa'i stobs kyis 'khor ba na
T02D1817:218a-16: gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang /
T02D1817:218a-17: nyan thos 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams shin tu
T02D1817:218a-18: skrag pa'i stobs kyis dngngas [*da dangs?] pa dang dus
T02D1817:218a-20: mi bskyod pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
T02D1817:218a-21: pos bslangs nas de dag gi don bstan pa 'di
T02D1817:218a-22: ni byang chub sems dpa'i gsang ba'i dbang gi gleng
T02D1817:218a-23: gzhi'o // de la gsang ba'i dbang gi rdzas gang la bya zhe na /
T02D1817:218a-24: rdzas ni dkar dmar bcu phyed ldan //
T02D1817:218a-25: gang du 'di yi sbyor ba byed //
T02D1817:218a-26: ces pa ni byang chub kyi sems dkar dmar dang /
T02D1817:218a-27: de las gzhan pa'i dri chen dang /
T02D1817:218a-30: shel la sogs pa 'di dag ni rdzas te /
T02D1817:218a-31: 'di la brten nas ngag gi rnam par rtog pa ldog par byed do //
T02D1817:218a-32: de yang gnas gang du bskur zhe na /
T02D1817:218a-33: gnas ni slob ma'i lce gsum la //
T02D1817:218a-34: sbom po dbang mos blangs te sbyin //
T02D1817:218a-36: mgrin pa dang snying ga dang lte ba ste /
T02D1817:218a-37: gang gi ro myong bar byed pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1817:218a-38: 'di'i rim pa'ang ci ltar yin zhe na /
T02D1817:218a-40: nor bu'i cha rten ngag la sbyin //
T02D1817:218a-41: lnga'am drug dang ldan pa ni //
T02D1817:218a-42: gsang ba'i dbang gi rim pa'o //
T02D1817:218a-43: zhes pa ni bdag nyid sbyor ba'i dbang du byas ta /
T02D1817:218a-44: shes rab ma'i chus rdo rje bkrus pa ni chu'i dbang ngo //
T02D1817:218a-45: nor bu'i cha la brten pa ni dbu rgyan gyi dbang ngo //
T02D1817:218a-46: rdo rje 'jug pa ni rdo rje'i dbang ngo //
T02D1817:218a-47: cag sgra ni dril bu'i dbang ngo //
T02D1817:218b-0: aa ha @218b aa ha zhes bya ba ni ming gi dbang ngo //
T02D1817:218b-1: yang ni dkar dmar spel ba ni phreng ba'i dbang ngo //
T02D1817:218b-2: bum pa gnyis nas 'byung bas chu'i dbang ngo //
T02D1817:218b-3: nor bu la brten pas dbu rgyan gyi dbang ngo //
T02D1817:218b-4: rdo rje la reg pas rdo rje'i dbang ngo //
T02D1817:218b-5: aa ho su kha zhes pa dril bu'i dbang ngo //
T02D1817:218b-6: babs pa'i yi ge la ming btags pa ni ming gi dbang ngo //
T02D1817:218b-7: yang na 'bral ba ma yin pa phreng ba'o //
T02D1817:218b-8: chu'i ngo bo nyid kyis chu'i dbang ngo //
T02D1817:218b-9: dgos pa thams cad 'byung bar byed pas dbu rgyan no //
T02D1817:218b-10: sel bar byed pa nyid kyis rdo rje'o //
T02D1817:218b-11: sgra thams cad dbang bskur bar byed pas dril bu'o //
T02D1817:218b-12: bdag por bstabs bas ming gi dbang ngo //
T02D1817:218b-13: de la'ang thabs ji lta bu zhig gis bskur zhe na /
T02D1817:218b-14: gang gis bkra shis bstod pa yis //
T02D1817:218b-15: nam phyed dus su bskur bar byed //
T02D1817:218b-16: ces pa rnal 'byor pa dang phyag rgya ma gnyis
T02D1817:218b-17: snyoms par zhugs pa'i byang sems dkar dmar phab ste
T02D1817:218b-18: tshogs kyi 'khor lo chen po byas la /
T02D1817:218b-19: nam phyed kyi dus su brtse bas byang sems rdo
T02D1817:218b-20: rje'i cha la brten nas bkra shis kyi tshigs su
T02D1817:218b-21: bcad pa'i bstod pas smon lam btab ste /
T02D1817:218b-22: slob ma'i ngag la byin la /
T02D1817:218b-23: slob mas kyang aa ho ma h'a su kha zhes btung par bya'o //
T02D1817:218b-24: de nas slob dpon la bstod pa byas pa 'di ni gsang ba'i dbang gi thabs so //
T02D1817:218b-25: 'o na dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor yang ji lta bu yin zhe na /
T02D1817:218b-26: dkyil 'khor lus kyi sbyor ba las //
T02D1817:218b-27: rtsa la sogs pa tshogs pa'o //
T02D1817:218b-28: zhes pa phyag rgya ma dang rdo rje slob dpon gyi lus la rtsa ni thig gi ngo bo'o //
T02D1817:218b-30: so dang sen mo dang ba spu ni tva ra na'o //
T02D1817:218b-31: khrag la sogs pa ni sa tshon gyi rang bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02D1817:218b-32: de bas na gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ni gnyis su shes par bya'o //
T02D1817:218b-33: der 'jug pa'i rim pa'ang ji ltar bya zhe na /
T02D1817:218b-34: ras kyis ngo yang dag pa bya ste //
T02D1817:218b-35: rang gi bya ba rdzogs par bya //
T02D1817:218b-36: zhes pa gang gis slob dpon dang phyag rgya ma gnyis snyoms bar 'jug pa'i dus su /
T02D1817:218b-37: bar du yol bas bcad de /
T02D1817:218b-38: ras dmar pos mig bkab la /
T02D1817:218b-39: dang por gsol ba gdab pa dang //
T02D1817:218b-41: lus kyi dkyil 'khor bstan pa dang //
T02D1817:218b-42: de kho na nyid kyi rim pa bstan pa'i bar du'o //
T02D1817:218b-43: de'i sngon du bya ba'ang gang zhig ce na /
T02D1817:219a-2: zhes pa ni bum pa'i dbang 'di ni spyi'i sngon du 'gro ba'o //
T02D1817:219a-3: bye brag gi sngon du 'gro ba gang yin zhe na /
T02D1817:219a-4: rig ma brtag dang bslang ba dang //
T02D1817:219a-5: byin nam ma byin brtag pa dang //
T02D1817:219a-6: sbyang dang skye dang gzung ba dang //
T02D1817:219a-7: bsrung dang gsang ba brtag dang ;
T02D1817:219a-8: / de yi bgegs rnams bskrad pa dang //
T02D1817:219a-9: byin rlabs de yi sbyor ba la //
T02D1817:219a-10: sta gon cho ga rdzogs byas nas //
T02D1817:219a-11: rig ma dbang bskur sbyor ba dang //
T02D1817:219a-12: bdag gis gnang ba nod pa dang //
T02D1817:219a-13: phyi rol du ni slob ma la //
T02D1817:219a-14: gsang ba'i dam tshig sbyin pa dang //
T02D1817:219a-15: gsang ba'i lha dang rdzas rnams kun ;
T02D1817:219a-16: / ji ltar sta gon bya ba dang //
T02D1817:219a-17: gang zhig dngos grub cho ga yi //
T02D1817:219a-18: sbyor ba mchog ni 'dir shes bya //
T02D1817:219a-19: zhes pa 'dis ni sa gzhi brtag pa la sogs
T02D1817:219a-20: pa'i sbyor ba bzhin du phyag rgya ma'ang dung mo
T02D1817:219a-21: dang drug mo la sogs pa brtag pa dang /
T02D1817:219a-22: yul gyi rgyal po dang pha la sogs pa la bslang ba dang /
T02D1817:219a-23: gzhan yang phyis dngos grub kyi sbyor ba'ang rmi lam du brtag pa dang /
T02D1817:219a-24: mandala la me tog gi gcal bkram la brtag pa dang /
T02D1817:219a-25: de nyid yum rdo rje kun du bzang mo'i ngo
T02D1817:219a-26: bor bskyed pa la sogs pa 'di dag ni sngon
T02D1817:219a-28: rtags kyi sbyor ba'ang gang yin zhe na /
T02D1817:219a-29: gang gis me tog der 'dor dang //
T02D1817:219a-30: de bzhin gzhan la'ang ltos pa'o //
T02D1817:219a-31: zhes pa ni gsang ba'i dus su mthong ba'i 'dri ba dang me tog dor ba dang /
T02D1817:219a-32: ye shes dbab pa'i sbyor bas smra ba la sogs pa 'byung par shes par bya'o //
T02D1817:219a-33: 'di'i dus kyi brda'ang gang yin zhe na /
T02D1817:219a-34: sbom pos dbang mo mnan pa ni /
T02D1817:219a-35: zla ba nyi ma'i sbyor ba'o //
T02D1817:219a-36: zhes pa gang gis sbom bos dbang mo mnan pa
T02D1817:219a-37: ni gsang ba'i dbang gi brda yin par shes par
T02D1817:219a-38: bya'o // gzhan ma g-yas kyi sbyor bas g-yon pa la byed pas yang la la dag 'dod do //
T02D1817:219a-39: de'i dus su'ang bsam gtan ji ltar bya zhe na /
T02D1817:219a-40: slob dpon rig ma ltar bsgom dang /
T02D1817:219a-41: gang gis bde ster bsam gtan yin //
T02D1817:219a-42: zhes pa gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i dus kyi bsam
T02D1817:219a-43: gtan yang dang por slob rig ma dang bcas pa
T02D1817:219a-44: thabs dang shes rab kyi skur gnas par bya ste
T02D1817:219a-45: / de las byang chub sems kyi chus bkang ba'i
T02D1817:219b-0: bum pa thogs @219b pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa
T02D1817:219b-1: byung nas slob ma'i lce la dbang bskur bar bya'o
T02D1817:219b-2: / // 'o na des bag chags sam dri ma gang 'khru bar byed na /
T02D1817:219b-3: ngag gi rtog dang dri mar bcas //
T02D1817:219b-4: sbyong bar byed pa nus pa'o //
T02D1817:219b-5: zhes pa tshig 'khyal pa la sogs pa'i dri ma
T02D1817:219b-6: thams cad gang gis 'khru bar nus pa de la
T02D1817:219b-8: gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i slob ma de la'ang gang gi man ngag bstan par bya zhe na /
T02D1817:219b-9: spros bcas dang ni spros med dang //
T02D1817:219b-10: shin tu spros med de la bstan //
T02D1817:219b-11: zhes pa sbyin pa la sogs pa dang /
T02D1817:219b-12: gang gis bud med bsten pa la sogs pa dus
T02D1817:219b-13: dang bya ba dang bsam pa la ltos pa'i spros
T02D1817:219b-15: shin tu spros pa med pa'i spyod pa'i man ngag bstan par bya'o //
T02D1817:219b-16: de'ang tshogs gang dang 'brel pa yin zhe na /
T02D1817:219b-17: gsang ba'i dbang ni bskur byas nas //
T02D1817:219b-18: zab pa phyi yi tshogs rnams bya //
T02D1817:219b-19: zhes pa gang gsang ba'i dbang thob pa de dag
T02D1817:219b-20: gis ni dang bor bskyed pa'i rim pa la sogs
T02D1817:219b-21: pa'i dus nas zab pa phyi'i 'khor la bud med
T02D1817:219b-22: nyi shu rtsa lnga la sogs pa la brten par
T02D1817:219b-23: bya'o // 'on gsang ba'i dbang yang dngos grub gang dang 'brel pa yin zhe na /
T02D1817:219b-26: myur du 'grub par byed pa yin //
T02D1817:219b-27: zhes pa 'di'i sbyor bas sa 'og dang ri lu
T02D1817:219b-28: dang bud med kyi sbyor pa la brten pa las
T02D1817:219b-29: byung ba'i bcud kyis len dang /
T02D1817:219b-30: mngon shes la sogs pa myur du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1817:219b-32: gang gis de dang de las gzhan //
T02D1817:219b-34: zhes pa gang gis gang la brten nas thun mong dang mchog gi dngos grub dngos su dang /
T02D1817:219b-35: brgyud nas 'grub pa'am thob pa 'di ni 'bras bu'o //
T02D1817:219b-36: yang na 'bras bu ni mgrin par snang ba mtha'
T02D1817:219b-37: yas su gyur pa gang yin pa de la de
T02D1817:219b-38: skad ces bya'o // 'di dag gis ni gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba bstan to //
T02D1817:219b-39: de nas shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur bshad par bya ste /
T02D1817:219b-40: 'di'i yang ngo bo nyid gang yin zhe na /
T02D1817:219b-42: byang chub sems kyi bde ba ni //
T02D1817:219b-43: gsum pa'i dbang gi ngo bo'o //
T02D1817:219b-44: zhes pa rang gi byang chub sems kyi bde ba
T02D1817:219b-45: nyams su myong ba 'di ni shes rab ye shes
T02D1817:220a-0: 'di la'ang nus pa zhes pa ma smras @220a * //
T02D1817:220a-2: 'di nyid ni nus pa zhes bya kho na ste /
T02D1817:220a-4: ye shes zhes bya ba 'di'ang du zhe na /
T02D1817:220a-5: phyi nang spas pa'i bye brag gis /
T02D1817:220a-6: gsum pa'i dbang gis dbye ba yin //
T02D1817:220a-7: zhes pa rig ma gtad pa ni phyi'i'o //
T02D1817:220a-8: de la byang chub sems bskyod pas 'byung ba ni nang gi'o //
T02D1817:220a-9: da bzlog pa'i stobs kyis 'byung ba ni spas pa'o //
T02D1817:220a-10: 'di la'ang ci'i phyir shes rab ye shes zhes bya zhe na /
T02D1817:220a-11: shes rab la brten ye shes te //
T02D1817:220a-12: ye shes thob par byed phyir ro //
T02D1817:220a-13: zhes pa ye shes bskyed pa'i rgyu'i phyir dang /
T02D1817:220a-14: ye shes dang nye ba nyid 'dra ba nyid kyi phyir te /
T02D1817:220a-15: go rims bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D1817:220a-16: rnam grangs kyang gang dang gang yin zhe na /
T02D1817:220a-17: shes rab ye shes bla na med //
T02D1817:220a-18: thabs kyi dam pa nye ba'i rgyu //
T02D1817:220a-19: zhes pa shes rab ma la brten nas ye shes skye ba nyid dang /
T02D1817:220a-20: gong na gzhan med pa nyid dang /
T02D1817:220a-21: mchog dam pa nyid 'grub par byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1817:220a-22: 'o na shes rab ye shes kyi dbang zhes bya
T02D1817:220a-23: ba 'di yang chos du dang ldan pa yin zhe
T02D1817:220a-24: na / shes rab la brten ye shes skye //
T02D1817:220a-25: ting nge 'dzin dmigs bdag gis 'jug / byang chub sems spyod nye ba'i rgyu //
T02D1817:220a-26: zhes pa shes rab dam pa bskyed pa nyid dang /
T02D1817:220a-28: ting nge 'dzin dam pa la dmigs pa nyid dang
T02D1817:220a-29: thabs bden pa'i rnal 'byor pa bdag nyid kyi 'jug
T02D1817:220a-30: pa dang / zhu ba byang chub sems la spyod pa dang /
T02D1817:220a-31: de'ang nye ba'i rgyur 'dug pa ste /
T02D1817:220a-32: 'di ltar drug dang ldan pa kho na yin no zhe'o //
T02D1817:220a-33: 'o na de smos pas ci byed na /
T02D1817:220a-34: bum pa dang ni gsang ba dang //
T02D1817:220a-35: thob bya bzhi pa sel bar byed //
T02D1817:220a-36: ces pa shes rab ma ma smos na ni phyi
T02D1817:220a-37: dang nang gi bum pa la'ang thal bar 'gyur la
T02D1817:220a-38: / ting nge 'dzin ma smos na ni so so skye bo la'ang thal bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1817:220a-39: de'ang bdag nyid kyis 'jug pa zhes ma smos na /
T02D1817:220a-40: gsang ba la'ang thal bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1817:220a-41: byang chub sems la spyod pa ma smos na bzhi
T02D1817:220a-42: pa dang g-yon gyi yum bskyed pa'i rim pa la'ang
T02D1817:220a-44: nye ba'i rgyu zhes pa ma smos na 'grub pa
T02D1817:220a-45: ma yin pa'i log par rtog pa'ang ldog par mi
T02D1817:220a-46: 'gyur ro // 'o na dbang gsum pa'i rgyu gang yin zhe na /
T02D1817:220a-47: shes rab ting 'dzin dmigs pa yis //
T02D1817:220b-0: bye brag dang bcas de yi @220b rgyu ;
T02D1817:220b-2: 'o na dus gang gi tshe bskur zhe na /
T02D1817:220b-3: dbang gnyis rdzogs dang gang ma rnams //
T02D1817:220b-4: gsum pa'i dbang gis dus zhes bshad //
T02D1817:220b-5: ces pa dang por bum pa'i dbang thob pa'i steng
T02D1817:220b-6: la phyi nas gsang ba'i dbang thob pa bla ma
T02D1817:220b-8: byang chub sems gnyis rgyas pa dang /
T02D1817:220b-10: gsum pa'i gling gzhi'ang gang zhe na /
T02D1817:220b-11: rgyal ba yum dang mnyam sbyar tshe //
T02D1817:220b-12: 'khor rnams dus sogs gleng gzhi yin //
